title: Liv Condominium by Arthaland
description:
Liv North Condominium, the newest project of  ARTHALAND - the first and only developer in the Philippines with green building, eco-friendly concept.

Overview:

Liv is envisioned as a vertical sustainable community located along Katipunan Avenue in Loyola Heights, Quezon City, providing seamless access to top universities like Ateneo, UP, and Miriam College. 


Sustainability & Design:

Built with green, eco-conscious design principles, Liv aims to minimize energy and water usage, aligning with ARTHALAND’s mission for sustainable living. 

As part of ARTHALAND's porfolio- Liv reflects world-class quality and environmental responsibility. 

Building & Units

Liv North is planned to be 46 stories tall, accommodating 748 residential units.

Unit sizes range from:

Studios: Approx. 24–29 sqm

1-Bedroom: Approx. 40–47 sqm

2-Bedroom: Approx. 68–70 sqm 

Lifestyle & Amenities:

Liv combines thoughtfully designed study areas, wellness zones, and social spaces to foster holistic, balanced living. 

The location’s prime accessibility to schools, malls, cafés, and transport, coupled with its smart, sustainable amenities, makes it highly appealing for students, families, and long-term investors alike. 


Investment Appeal:

Positioned in one of Metro Manila’s key academic hubs, Liv addresses strong rental demand - especially among parents and students - making it an attractive property investment. 

The developer’s sustainable credentials add value retention appeal amid broader condo market fluctuations. 

With a reservation fee of only P50,000.00 and an estimated monthly equity of P37,000.00 you can already secure a unit in this prime condominium location.

Availability includes studio, 1 bedroom and 2 bedroom units, ideal for diverse lifestyles and budgets. 

Sustainability	ARTHALAND-certified eco - friendly living.
Ideal For	Students, families, investors.

If you’d like details on floor plans, pricing per unit type, financing schemes, or developer sustainability certifications, feel free to ask—I’m happy to help!

Your Real Estate Advisor here:
Rebecca Manto
PRC Lic. No. 14714
DHSUD Reg. No. 0358

LIV DHSUD LS NO. 0001183
Address: Katipunan Avenue and Esteban Abada Street, Brgy. Loyola Heights, Quezon City
Completion Date: Q3 2031
Project Owner: ASEC Development and Construction
Developer: Sotern Land Corporation

description:

Inclusive Capital Gains Tax

description:
Prime living right across Ateneo—your chance to own a rare address in Katipunan’s most sought-after spot.
Introducing LIV North by Arthaland, a future-ready, eco-friendly condominium by the award-winning developer of Arya Residences, BGC.

Esteban Abada St., Loyola Heights, Quezon City
Direct footbridge access to Ateneo de Manila University
2 minutes to Miriam College, 5 minutes to UP Diliman
Close to LRT Katipunan, offices, malls, and lifestyle hubs
Surrounded by top schools and commercial centers—perfect for students, families, and investors
🌟 Why Choose LIV?
Exclusive launch promos + easy payment options
Walkable, master-planned community with high-end amenities
Up to 20% savings on utilities through sustainable design
Consistent rental demand from students, faculty, and professionals
🏠 Unit Options
Studio, 1-BR, 2-BR units
Prices start at ₱6M+
Monthly payment from just ₱20K
⚡ Only a limited number of units available—don’t miss the opportunity to invest in Katipunan’s premier address before values go up!
📲 Message us today to learn more and reserve your unit.

title: LIV Residences Katipunan Quezon City | Exclusive Pre-Selling Condo Beside Ateneo de Manila University
description:
Experience Katipunan Living at Its Finest!

Nestled in the heart of Katipunan’s vibrant community, LIV Katipunan by Arthaland redefines modern living with sustainable, thoughtfully designed spaces. From study areas and wellness zones to social spaces, this vertical community is built for a balanced lifestyle where wellness, connection, and green living thrive.

And here’s the best part: The Only Condominium in Katipunan with a Private Bridge Directly Connected to Ateneo Campus. No traffic, no hassle, just a quick, safe walk across campus.

💡 A good investment whether for personal use, family, or rental opportunities.

Why LIV Katipunan?
• Studio to 2BR units (24–70 sqm)
• Starts at just ₱37,200/month
• Backed by Arthaland’s green & sustainable standards
• Ideal for students, families, and investors
• Walk to class, walk to work, walk to wellness
• World-class amenities such as a swimming pool, gym, roof deck, landscaped gardens, and study halls designed for both focus and relaxation

📍 Soon to rise along Katipunan Avenue, Quezon City, steps away from the metro’s best schools, trendy cafés, and lifestyle hubs.

🎓 Perfect for Ateneo students, staff, and alumni families looking for convenience + long-term value!

🏆 Arthaland Advantage: The only real estate developer in the Philippines with a 100% certified sustainable portfolio—ensuring your investment carries both premium quality and eco-conscious value.

At over 250 meters in height, the Shang Summit towers will be the tallest residential development in the Philippines, poised to redefine the Quezon City and Metro Manila skylines with their iconic silhouettes.

Designed by world-renowned architectural firm P&T Group, Shang Summit features a stunning modern form and panoramic views of the city on all sides.

At a glance	
→ 259.7 Meters

HEIGHT	
→ 1020 (East Tower)	

UNITS	
→ 80 Floors	

FLOORS	
→ 2,318 sqm	

INDOOR AMENITIES	
→ 2496.53 sqm	

OUTDOOR AMENITIES	
→ 879 (East Tower) CARPARKS	

----------------------------------------------

HANDOVER PROVISIONS
•	Entrance: Digital lockset door
•	Living and Dining Spaces: Engineered wood, aircon
•	Master and Secondary Bedrooms: Aircon, modular wardrobe
•	Master & Secondary Bathrooms: Porcelain tiles, water heater
•	Kitchen: Branded appliances, modular cabinets
•	Utility Room: Porcelain tiles, painted walls
•	Utility Bathroom: Sink, shower, water heater
•	Balcony: Porcelain tile flooring

FACILITIES & SERVICES
•	24-hour management services by Shang Properties
•	Dedicated reception and concierge
•	24-hour security
•	CCTV monitoring system at main lobby, all lifts and amenities floor
•	Access cards for residences
•	RFID for vehicles
•	Centralized fire detection, alarm, and sprinkler system
•	Public address & background music at amenity area
•	Rubbish room with garbage chute in every floor for waste disposal

BUILDING FEATURES
•	Service / Fireman’s lift
•	100% back up power for common areas
•	70% back up power for residential units
•	Dedicated mail room
•	Dedicated utility meters for water, and electricity
•	Dual provisions for telephone and data points
•	Provision for cable television, fiber optic backbone
•	Fiber To The Home (FTTH) up to Residential Units

title: Studio Semi Furnished with Parking For Sale Eastwood Parkview Eastwood Ave. Quezon City
description:
Eastwood Parkview is located in the middle of Eastwood City Cyberpark QC. very accessible via C5 and a few minutes drive to Ortigas Center, Cubao Araneta Center and BGC. Also very close to Katipunan Ave- Ateneo, Miriam College and UP

Very safe and secured residential / business district. Walking distance to malls, commercial shops, banks, restaurants, cafes, convenience stores, supermarket , drugstore, offices and a chapel.

The building is on top of Eastwood Mall.

Amenities: Hotel like lobby, Swimming pool and gym.

*** 4 new elevators ***

15th floor floor of tower 1. 29 sqm studio, with 1 t&b. 1 parking slot , view of inside Eastwood.

Improved, Semi-furnished, vacant & ready for viewing.

Selling price Php5,000,000=P120k/sqm

Inclusive of Capital Gains Tax.

Terms are Cash or Bank Financing.

***Negotiable***

At over 250 meters in height, the Shang Summit towers will be the tallest residential development in the Philippines, poised to redefine the Quezon City and Metro Manila skylines with their iconic silhouettes.

Designed by world-renowned architectural firm P&T Group, Shang Summit features a stunning modern form and panoramic views of the city on all sides.

At a glance	
→ 259.7 Meters

HEIGHT	
→ 1020 (East Tower)	

UNITS	
→ 80 Floors	

FLOORS	
→ 2,318 sqm	

INDOOR AMENITIES	
→ 2496.53 sqm	

OUTDOOR AMENITIES	
→ 879 (East Tower) CARPARKS	

----------------------------------------------

HANDOVER PROVISIONS
•	Entrance: Digital lockset door
•	Living and Dining Spaces: Engineered wood, aircon
•	Master and Secondary Bedrooms: Aircon, modular wardrobe
•	Master & Secondary Bathrooms: Porcelain tiles, water heater
•	Kitchen: Branded appliances, modular cabinets
•	Utility Room: Porcelain tiles, painted walls
•	Utility Bathroom: Sink, shower, water heater
•	Balcony: Porcelain tile flooring

FACILITIES & SERVICES
•	24-hour management services by Shang Properties
•	Dedicated reception and concierge
•	24-hour security
•	CCTV monitoring system at main lobby, all lifts and amenities floor
•	Access cards for residences
•	RFID for vehicles
•	Centralized fire detection, alarm, and sprinkler system
•	Public address & background music at amenity area
•	Rubbish room with garbage chute in every floor for waste disposal

BUILDING FEATURES
•	Service / Fireman’s lift
•	100% back up power for common areas
•	70% back up power for residential units
•	Dedicated mail room
•	Dedicated utility meters for water, and electricity
•	Dual provisions for telephone and data points
•	Provision for cable television, fiber optic backbone
•	Fiber To The Home (FTTH) up to Residential Units

description:

Description:

This brand-new 2-bedroom, 4-bathroom unit with a total floor area of 155 sqm is located in Mariposa Mews, a high-end, low-rise condominium along C. Benitez Street, Bagong Lipunan ng Crame, Quezon City. It features a primary bedroom with en suite bath, a secondary bedroom with its own bathroom, a kitchen with bar, and a powder room for guests. Parking is available and sold separately.

Mariposa Mews is a low-rise, high-end condominium built with sustainability in mind. It is proudly pursuing LEED Gold Certification and features double-glazed windows, exterior insulation (EIFS), a variable refrigerant flow (VRF) system with MERV 13 filters, rainwater catchment, and low to no-VOC materials.

Building amenities include rooftop gardens, a rooftop function room, a ground floor playscape, two passenger elevators, a two-level basement parking for 68 cars, and 24/7 security with CCTV surveillance.

title: Penthouse unit Haraya Residences in Bridgetowne by Shangrila Properties at Pasig City C5 near BGC Ortigas
description:
𝐇𝐚𝐫𝐚𝐲𝐚 𝐑𝐞𝐬𝐢𝐝𝐞𝐧𝐜𝐞𝐬: 𝐔𝐬𝐡𝐞𝐫𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐢𝐧 𝐚 𝐍𝐞𝐰 𝐄𝐫𝐚 𝐨𝐟 𝐂𝐨𝐬𝐦𝐨𝐩𝐨𝐥𝐢𝐭𝐚𝐧 𝐋𝐢𝐯𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐢𝐧 𝐁𝐫𝐢𝐝𝐠𝐞𝐬𝐭𝐨𝐰𝐧𝐞 𝐄𝐬𝐭𝐚𝐭𝐞
Welcome to Haraya Residences, a visionary development poised to redefine luxury living in the heart of Bridgestowne Estate (30 Hectares Mixed-used Community). This exceptional project is the result of a collaboration between the finest architects, designers, and artisans, dedicated to bringing a unique vision of cosmopolitan living to life.

𝐀 𝐏𝐫𝐞𝐬𝐭𝐢𝐠𝐢𝐨𝐮𝐬 𝐉𝐨𝐢𝐧𝐭 𝐕𝐞𝐧𝐭𝐮𝐫𝐞
Haraya Residences is proudly brought to you by Shang Robinsons Properties, Inc., a strategic joint venture between Shang Properties, Inc., and Robinsons Land Corporation. This powerful partnership is also behind the ultra-luxury Aurelia Residences in BGC, a testament to their commitment to unparalleled quality and sophisticated design.

𝐔𝐧𝐜𝐨𝐦𝐩𝐫𝐨𝐦𝐢𝐬𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐃𝐞𝐬𝐢𝐠𝐧 & 𝐆𝐫𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐒𝐜𝐚𝐥𝐞
Haraya Residences stands tall at 57 floors, embodying modern architectural brilliance. With a total of 558 units and 702 parking spaces, it offers an exclusive and well-appointed residential experience.

𝐖𝐨𝐫𝐥𝐝-𝐂𝐥𝐚𝐬𝐬 𝐀𝐦𝐞𝐧𝐢𝐭𝐢𝐞𝐬 𝐟𝐨𝐫 𝐃𝐢𝐬𝐜𝐞𝐫𝐧𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐑𝐞𝐬𝐢𝐝𝐞𝐧𝐭𝐬
Haraya Residences boasts an impressive array of indoor and outdoor amenities, meticulously designed for leisure, wellness, and convenience.

𝐈𝐧𝐝𝐨𝐨𝐫 𝐀𝐦𝐞𝐧𝐢𝐭𝐢𝐞𝐬:
With 2,270 sqm dedicated to indoor facilities, residents can enjoy:

Ground Floor: Concierge, Mailroom, Main Lobby, Lounge Area

Amenity Level 7: The Veranda Indoor Alfresco, The Tea Room, The Studio, The Playroom, The Library, The Lounge

Amenity Level 7 Mezzanine: The Chef's Kitchen, The Lobby Lounge, The Game Room, The Viewing Room, The Gym, Changing Rooms, Sauna

𝐎𝐮𝐭𝐝𝐨𝐨𝐫 𝐀𝐦𝐞𝐧𝐢𝐭𝐢𝐞𝐬:
Spanning 2,500 sqm, the outdoor areas provide a lush escape:

The Lawn: Tropical Pool, Kiddie Pool, Jacuzzi, Children's Play Area, Outdoor Lounge Area, Garden Areas

𝐔𝐧𝐩𝐚𝐫𝐚𝐥𝐥𝐞𝐥𝐞𝐝 𝐂𝐨𝐧𝐯𝐞𝐧𝐢𝐞𝐧𝐜𝐞 & 𝐄𝐱𝐜𝐥𝐮𝐬𝐢𝐯𝐢𝐭𝐲
Lifts: 6 Passenger lifts, 1 Private Elevator for 3-bedroom units, and 1 Service lift ensure seamless access.

Basement: Dedicated Parking and Carwash Bay for residents.

𝐄𝐱𝐪𝐮𝐢𝐬𝐢𝐭𝐞 𝐔𝐧𝐢𝐭 𝐎𝐩𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧𝐬
Haraya Residences offers a selection of meticulously crafted units to suit diverse lifestyles:

One Bedroom: 60 to 87 sqm with 1 parking slot

Two Bedroom: 107-142 sqm with 1-2 parking slots

Three Bedroom: 186-187 sqm with 2 parking slots

Penthouse: 497-517 sqm

Note: Price is for unit only + VAT.

𝐖𝐞𝐥𝐜𝐨𝐦𝐞 𝐡𝐨𝐦𝐞 𝐭𝐨 𝐇𝐚𝐫𝐚𝐲𝐚 𝐑𝐞𝐬𝐢𝐝𝐞𝐧𝐜𝐞𝐬, 𝐰𝐡𝐞𝐫𝐞 𝐞𝐯𝐞𝐫𝐲 𝐝𝐞𝐭𝐚𝐢𝐥 𝐢𝐬 𝐝𝐞𝐬𝐢𝐠𝐧𝐞𝐝 𝐟𝐨𝐫 𝐚𝐧 𝐮𝐧𝐜𝐨𝐦𝐩𝐫𝐨𝐦𝐢𝐬𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐧𝐞𝐰 𝐩𝐞𝐫𝐬𝐩𝐞𝐜𝐭𝐢𝐯𝐞 𝐨𝐧 𝐜𝐨𝐬𝐦𝐨𝐩𝐨𝐥𝐢𝐭𝐚𝐧 𝐥𝐢𝐯𝐢𝐧𝐠.

𝑩𝒆 𝒕𝒉𝒆 𝒇𝒊𝒓𝒔𝒕 𝒕𝒐 𝒐𝒘𝒏 𝒚𝒐𝒖𝒓 𝒑𝒓𝒐𝒑𝒆𝒓𝒕𝒚 𝒇𝒐𝒓 𝒌𝒆𝒆𝒑𝒔. 𝑴𝒆𝒔𝒔𝒂𝒈𝒆 𝒖𝒔 𝒕𝒐𝒅𝒂𝒚 𝒕𝒐 𝒔𝒄𝒉𝒆𝒅𝒖𝒍𝒆 𝒂 𝒔𝒊𝒕𝒆 𝒗𝒊𝒔𝒊𝒕 𝒂𝒏𝒅 𝒆𝒙𝒑𝒆𝒓𝒊𝒆𝒏𝒄𝒆 𝒕𝒉𝒆 𝒏𝒆𝒘 𝒆𝒓𝒂 𝒐𝒇 𝒍𝒖𝒙𝒖𝒓𝒚!

description:
𝐇𝐚𝐫𝐚𝐲𝐚 𝐑𝐞𝐬𝐢𝐝𝐞𝐧𝐜𝐞𝐬: 𝐔𝐬𝐡𝐞𝐫𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐢𝐧 𝐚 𝐍𝐞𝐰 𝐄𝐫𝐚 𝐨𝐟 𝐂𝐨𝐬𝐦𝐨𝐩𝐨𝐥𝐢𝐭𝐚𝐧 𝐋𝐢𝐯𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐢𝐧 𝐁𝐫𝐢𝐝𝐠𝐞𝐬𝐭𝐨𝐰𝐧𝐞 𝐄𝐬𝐭𝐚𝐭𝐞
Welcome to Haraya Residences, a visionary development poised to redefine luxury living in the heart of Bridgestowne Estate (30 Hectares Mixed-used Community). This exceptional project is the result of a collaboration between the finest architects, designers, and artisans, dedicated to bringing a unique vision of cosmopolitan living to life.

𝐀 𝐏𝐫𝐞𝐬𝐭𝐢𝐠𝐢𝐨𝐮𝐬 𝐉𝐨𝐢𝐧𝐭 𝐕𝐞𝐧𝐭𝐮𝐫𝐞
Haraya Residences is proudly brought to you by Shang Robinsons Properties, Inc., a strategic joint venture between Shang Properties, Inc., and Robinsons Land Corporation. This powerful partnership is also behind the ultra-luxury Aurelia Residences in BGC, a testament to their commitment to unparalleled quality and sophisticated design.

𝐔𝐧𝐜𝐨𝐦𝐩𝐫𝐨𝐦𝐢𝐬𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐃𝐞𝐬𝐢𝐠𝐧 & 𝐆𝐫𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐒𝐜𝐚𝐥𝐞
Haraya Residences stands tall at 57 floors, embodying modern architectural brilliance. With a total of 558 units and 702 parking spaces, it offers an exclusive and well-appointed residential experience.

𝐖𝐨𝐫𝐥𝐝-𝐂𝐥𝐚𝐬𝐬 𝐀𝐦𝐞𝐧𝐢𝐭𝐢𝐞𝐬 𝐟𝐨𝐫 𝐃𝐢𝐬𝐜𝐞𝐫𝐧𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐑𝐞𝐬𝐢𝐝𝐞𝐧𝐭𝐬
Haraya Residences boasts an impressive array of indoor and outdoor amenities, meticulously designed for leisure, wellness, and convenience.

𝐈𝐧𝐝𝐨𝐨𝐫 𝐀𝐦𝐞𝐧𝐢𝐭𝐢𝐞𝐬:
With 2,270 sqm dedicated to indoor facilities, residents can enjoy:

Ground Floor: Concierge, Mailroom, Main Lobby, Lounge Area

Amenity Level 7: The Veranda Indoor Alfresco, The Tea Room, The Studio, The Playroom, The Library, The Lounge

Amenity Level 7 Mezzanine: The Chef's Kitchen, The Lobby Lounge, The Game Room, The Viewing Room, The Gym, Changing Rooms, Sauna

𝐎𝐮𝐭𝐝𝐨𝐨𝐫 𝐀𝐦𝐞𝐧𝐢𝐭𝐢𝐞𝐬:
Spanning 2,500 sqm, the outdoor areas provide a lush escape:

The Lawn: Tropical Pool, Kiddie Pool, Jacuzzi, Children's Play Area, Outdoor Lounge Area, Garden Areas

𝐔𝐧𝐩𝐚𝐫𝐚𝐥𝐥𝐞𝐥𝐞𝐝 𝐂𝐨𝐧𝐯𝐞𝐧𝐢𝐞𝐧𝐜𝐞 & 𝐄𝐱𝐜𝐥𝐮𝐬𝐢𝐯𝐢𝐭𝐲
Lifts: 6 Passenger lifts, 1 Private Elevator for 3-bedroom units, and 1 Service lift ensure seamless access.

Basement: Dedicated Parking and Carwash Bay for residents.

𝐄𝐱𝐪𝐮𝐢𝐬𝐢𝐭𝐞 𝐔𝐧𝐢𝐭 𝐎𝐩𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧𝐬
Haraya Residences offers a selection of meticulously crafted units to suit diverse lifestyles:

One Bedroom: 60 to 87 sqm with 1 parking slot

Two Bedroom: 107-142 sqm with 1-2 parking slots

Three Bedroom: 186-187 sqm with 2 parking slots

Penthouse: 497-517 sqm

Note: Price is for unit only + VAT.

𝐖𝐞𝐥𝐜𝐨𝐦𝐞 𝐡𝐨𝐦𝐞 𝐭𝐨 𝐇𝐚𝐫𝐚𝐲𝐚 𝐑𝐞𝐬𝐢𝐝𝐞𝐧𝐜𝐞𝐬, 𝐰𝐡𝐞𝐫𝐞 𝐞𝐯𝐞𝐫𝐲 𝐝𝐞𝐭𝐚𝐢𝐥 𝐢𝐬 𝐝𝐞𝐬𝐢𝐠𝐧𝐞𝐝 𝐟𝐨𝐫 𝐚𝐧 𝐮𝐧𝐜𝐨𝐦𝐩𝐫𝐨𝐦𝐢𝐬𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐧𝐞𝐰 𝐩𝐞𝐫𝐬𝐩𝐞𝐜𝐭𝐢𝐯𝐞 𝐨𝐧 𝐜𝐨𝐬𝐦𝐨𝐩𝐨𝐥𝐢𝐭𝐚𝐧 𝐥𝐢𝐯𝐢𝐧𝐠.

𝑩𝒆 𝒕𝒉𝒆 𝒇𝒊𝒓𝒔𝒕 𝒕𝒐 𝒐𝒘𝒏 𝒚𝒐𝒖𝒓 𝒑𝒓𝒐𝒑𝒆𝒓𝒕𝒚 𝒇𝒐𝒓 𝒌𝒆𝒆𝒑𝒔. 𝑴𝒆𝒔𝒔𝒂𝒈𝒆 𝒖𝒔 𝒕𝒐𝒅𝒂𝒚 𝒕𝒐 𝒔𝒄𝒉𝒆𝒅𝒖𝒍𝒆 𝒂 𝒔𝒊𝒕𝒆 𝒗𝒊𝒔𝒊𝒕 𝒂𝒏𝒅 𝒆𝒙𝒑𝒆𝒓𝒊𝒆𝒏𝒄𝒆 𝒕𝒉𝒆 𝒏𝒆𝒘 𝒆𝒓𝒂 𝒐𝒇 𝒍𝒖𝒙𝒖𝒓𝒚!

title: 1 Bedroom with Parking Haraya Residences in Bridgetowne by Shang Properties at Pasig City C5 near Opus Parklinks Lattice Velaris Grove Maple Cirrus Ea
description:
𝐇𝐚𝐫𝐚𝐲𝐚 𝐑𝐞𝐬𝐢𝐝𝐞𝐧𝐜𝐞𝐬: 𝐔𝐬𝐡𝐞𝐫𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐢𝐧 𝐚 𝐍𝐞𝐰 𝐄𝐫𝐚 𝐨𝐟 𝐂𝐨𝐬𝐦𝐨𝐩𝐨𝐥𝐢𝐭𝐚𝐧 𝐋𝐢𝐯𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐢𝐧 𝐁𝐫𝐢𝐝𝐠𝐞𝐬𝐭𝐨𝐰𝐧𝐞 𝐄𝐬𝐭𝐚𝐭𝐞
Welcome to Haraya Residences, a visionary development poised to redefine luxury living in the heart of Bridgestowne Estate (30 Hectares Mixed-used Community). This exceptional project is the result of a collaboration between the finest architects, designers, and artisans, dedicated to bringing a unique vision of cosmopolitan living to life.

𝐀 𝐏𝐫𝐞𝐬𝐭𝐢𝐠𝐢𝐨𝐮𝐬 𝐉𝐨𝐢𝐧𝐭 𝐕𝐞𝐧𝐭𝐮𝐫𝐞
Haraya Residences is proudly brought to you by Shang Robinsons Properties, Inc., a strategic joint venture between Shang Properties, Inc., and Robinsons Land Corporation. This powerful partnership is also behind the ultra-luxury Aurelia Residences in BGC, a testament to their commitment to unparalleled quality and sophisticated design.

𝐔𝐧𝐜𝐨𝐦𝐩𝐫𝐨𝐦𝐢𝐬𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐃𝐞𝐬𝐢𝐠𝐧 & 𝐆𝐫𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐒𝐜𝐚𝐥𝐞
Haraya Residences stands tall at 57 floors, embodying modern architectural brilliance. With a total of 558 units and 702 parking spaces, it offers an exclusive and well-appointed residential experience.

With 2,270 sqm dedicated to indoor facilities, residents can enjoy:

Ground Floor: Concierge, Mailroom, Main Lobby, Lounge Area

Amenity Level 7: The Veranda Indoor Alfresco, The Tea Room, The Studio, The Playroom, The Library, The Lounge

Amenity Level 7 Mezzanine: The Chef's Kitchen, The Lobby Lounge, The Game Room, The Viewing Room, The Gym, Changing Rooms, Sauna

description:
Located within the SM City Novaliches complex, it offers lifestyle unlike any other in the area. Wake up surrounded by verdant greens, and get your dose of shopping and entertainment with the mall just across! Here, you get more than just a home, you get a lifestyle.
 

 Strewn around its amenity area are spaces of fun and leisure like parks, pools, fitness zones, play areas, and lounges. Stroll leisurely along the manicured pathways of the Central Park and admire the Sunken Garden. Jumpstart your day with a swim at any of the two adult pools or take your children to their first dip at the children's splash pool.
 

 Vast open greenery. Secluded sunken gardens. Calm, expansive pools. These are but a few of the exclusive amenities you can enjoy within the gated community that is Vine Residences. Beyond it, you can explore the next-door SM City Novaliches or travel farther via the major roads and transport hubs nearby.
 

 Condo Property for Sale in Novaliches, Quezon City, Metro Manila

title: 3-Bedroom Upgraded Condo at 53 Benitez by Rockwell in Quezon City
description:
FOR SALE! 3-Bedroom Upgraded Condo at 53 Benitez by Rockwell in Quezon City

Enjoy elevated city living in this rare 3-bedroom unit at 53 Benitez by Rockwell, located in the serene neighborhood of C. Benitez, Quezon City. This upgraded 95-sqm home offers a functional layout with a staff room and T&B, plus a separate drying cage at the roofdeck—perfect for practical everyday living. With a balcony that overlooks an open vacant lot and bedroom views facing P. Tuazon, this unit is bright, breezy, and private. Rockwell Land’s signature finishes and well-maintained amenities make this property an ideal home for growing families or as a solid investment in a low-density, exclusive community.

95 sqm 3-Bedroom Condo For Sale – 53 Benitez, C. Benitez, Quezon City – ₱16,000,000

FOR SALE! 3-Bedroom Upgraded Condo at 53 Benitez by Rockwell in Quezon City

Floor Area: 95 sqm
Orientation: Bedroom view facing P. Tuazon
Selling Price: ₱16,000,000

Other Details
3 Bedrooms
2 Toilets & Baths
1 Parking Slot
With staff room and own toilet & bath
Balcony with view of a vacant lot
Upgraded finishes and fixtures
Drying cage/laundry area on roof deck (3 sqm)
Clean title
Mid-rise Rockwell development in a peaceful residential area

Interested in this property? Call your Property Angel now!
‌
ANGEL SOUZA
PRC REBL No. 32754
RE/MAX Capital

53 Benitez by Rockwell is a boutique mid-rise condominium developed by Rockwell Primaries, nestled in the peaceful and private enclave of C. Benitez in New Manila, Quezon City. Known for its low-density layout and elegant finishes, the development offers exclusive living with only two buildings and a limited number of units. Residents enjoy access to premium amenities including a swimming pool, function rooms, landscaped gardens, and 24/7 security. Strategically located near P. Tuazon, Aurora Blvd., and Gilmore Avenue, it provides quick access to schools like Xavier School, ICA, St. Paul University QC, and Poveda. It's also a short drive from shopping hubs like Robinsons Magnolia, Greenhills Shopping Center, and Gateway Mall. With the area's continued development and strong demand for Rockwell properties, 53 Benitez presents solid long-term value whether for end-use or investment.

Looking for a property? Let us help you!

title: CONDOMINIUM 1 BEDROOM ONE BALETE NEW MANILA QUEZON CITY P7,950,000 SKYLINE TOWER FOR SALE
description:
UNIT:  64 sqm one bedroom unit on the 7th floor ready for occupancy .  Very spacious unit with open layout for it's living room, dining room and kitchen.  Ample spaced one bedroom with toilet and bath.  

The SKYLINE PREMIERE Tower is one of One Balete Towers built in a 2 hectare residential community.  The towers boasts of its units having high ceilings, ample space and tall windows allowing for comfortable luxury first class living.  It is right smack in the heart of New Manila Quezon City and N. Domingo San Juan with very easy access to Greenhills, Ortigas Center, Makati, Cubao.  Walk to restaurants and shopping at Magnolia Robinson Mall.  It is very near premier hospitals like St. Luke's Hospital, Cardinal Santos Medical Center both with 15 minutes driving distance.  Schools and places of worship surround the area as well.

The surrounding areas are predominantly Class AAA residential communities with lots of greenery from tree-lined strees and gardens giving this condo living an easy and fresh vibe with the full convenience of city living.

Whether you are a first time homebuyer, a couple building their first nest, or an empty nester one  gracefully transitioning into a new chapter of life, embracing a more streamlined but fulfilling lifestyle this condominium unit is for you.

MOST COMPETITIVELY PRICED:  P7,950,000 GROSS.  Call now !!!

Haraya Residences boasts an impressive array of indoor and outdoor amenities, meticulously designed for leisure, wellness, and convenience.

𝐔𝐧𝐩𝐚𝐫𝐚𝐥𝐥𝐞𝐥𝐞𝐝 𝐂𝐨𝐧𝐯𝐞𝐧𝐢𝐞𝐧𝐜𝐞 & 𝐄𝐱𝐜𝐥𝐮𝐬𝐢𝐯𝐢𝐭𝐲

 Every corner of this high-rise tower is created to give urban families the ultimate modern living experience, minus the cramped, boxed-in feeling common in some condominiums. The Celandine Residences is also designed to accommodate natural light, which gives the spaces that cheerful and refreshing feel.
 Located along A. Bonifacio Avenue in Quezon City, near the Cloverleaf in Balintawak, and other leisure hubs and business districts as well, it is also the perfect urban sanctuary for upwardly mobile individuals looking for a relaxing and secure living environment. It is also easily accessible via public transport: through the LRT1 - Monumento station, and buses and jeepneys plying the EDSA route.
 Every five floors of the tower is a landscaped sky patio, where residents can enjoy picturesque views of the neighborhood and the city. The Celandine Residences completes its worry-free resort atmosphere with its swimming pools, poolside cabana, and garden atrium.
 

 Unit Features:
 Nice view
 Not atrium floor
 2 bedrooms
 1 bathroom
 Under bank financing
 Floor area 48.5 sqm

title: Upgraded 3-Bedroom at 53 Benitez by Rockwell in Quezon City near Xavier School
description:
FOR SALE! 3-Bedroom Upgraded Condo at 53 Benitez by Rockwell in Quezon City

Enjoy elevated city living in this rare 3-bedroom unit at 53 Benitez by Rockwell, located in the serene neighborhood of C. Benitez, Quezon City. This upgraded 95-sqm home offers a functional layout with a staff room and T&B, plus a separate drying cage at the roofdeck—perfect for practical everyday living. With a balcony that overlooks an open vacant lot and bedroom views facing P. Tuazon, this unit is bright, breezy, and private. Rockwell Land’s signature finishes and well-maintained amenities make this property an ideal home for growing families or as a solid investment in a low-density, exclusive community.

Floor Area: 95 sqm

Orientation: Bedroom view facing P. Tuazon

Selling Price: ₱16,000,000

Other Details

3 Bedrooms

2 Toilets & Baths

1 Parking Slot

With staff room and own toilet & bath

Balcony with view of a vacant lot

Upgraded finishes and fixtures

Drying cage/laundry area on roof deck (3 sqm)

Clean title

Mid-rise Rockwell development in a peaceful residential area

Interested in this property? Call your Property Angel now!

ANGEL SOUZA

PRC REBL No. 32754

RE/MAX Capital

53 Benitez by Rockwell is a boutique mid-rise condominium developed by Rockwell Primaries, nestled in the peaceful and private enclave of C. Benitez in New Manila, Quezon City. Known for its low-density layout and elegant finishes, the development offers exclusive living with only two buildings and a limited number of units. Residents enjoy access to premium amenities including a swimming pool, function rooms, landscaped gardens, and 24/7 security. Strategically located near P. Tuazon, Aurora Blvd., and Gilmore Avenue, it provides quick access to schools like Xavier School, ICA, St. Paul University QC, and Poveda. It's also a short drive from shopping hubs like Robinsons Magnolia, Greenhills Shopping Center, and Gateway Mall. With the area's continued development and strong demand for Rockwell properties, 53 Benitez presents solid long-term value whether for end-use or investment.

Looking for a property? Let us help you!

title: FOR SALE:  2BR Escalades@20th Avenue, San Roque, Quezon City
description:
About Escalades at 20th Avenue
Escalades at the 20th is designed by Robinsons Land Corporation with its professional design partners, following a method called "Green Architecture". Buildings are made to be energy-efficient, allowing more natural sunlight into each unit and hallway, and providing greater air ventilation, which saves owners from added utility expenses in the long run. It's a wise investment that fits your long-term goals. Escalades will boast of The Escala Verde Courtyard, where your family can enjoy outdoor games and picnics. For people who make time for things that matter, Escalades has everything you need to create memories to last a lifetime.

description:
267 Katipunan Avenue, Loyola Heights, Quezon City




Hawthorne Heights | Condo in Katipunan
The biggest and most populous city in Metro Manila is Quezon City. Being the most densely inhabited city. The city's most densely inhabited has a diversified cultural and ethnic background and a flourishing business district. It is the center point of the Philippine entertainment industry, claiming the name Philippines' Hollywood. It is also located within nearby universities and academic institutions like Ateneo de Manila University and the University of the Philippines-Diliman.

Hawthorne Heights by Vista Residences is a pre-selling project along Katipunan Avenue. It offers studio units ranging from 19.50 sqm to 21.00 sqm and one-bedroom units with 37.60 sqm and 43.14 sqm perfectly fitted for students, young professionals, and families. Both Studio and 1-Bedroom units are fully finished. This pre-selling condo property is 41-story tall, with commercial, residential, and parking units and top-of-the-line amenities. description:
Vista Pointe | Katipunan, Quezon City
Rising 37 storeys high at the junction of Katipunan Avenue and B. Gonzales Street, Vista Pointe is the sophomore condominium offering of Vista Residences for students and young professionals in the lively locale.

One cannot get a better location than Vista Pointe, considering that it is a stone’s throw away from premier educational institutions such as Ateneo De Manila University, Miriam College, and University of the Philippines Diliman, and within walking distance of student-friendly establishments. The over 1,000-square meter property has a distinctively triangular-shaped layout, which makes the most out of its prime lot and location.




Vista Pointe by Vista Residences offers an inspiring, comfortable, and convenient option for hardworking students without bargaining their security. The area's undisturbed "university series" vibe is perfect for those who want to leave all the stresses of commuting and sharing small spaces in dormitories, apartments, and other rental options. Not to mention one of the new infrastructure developments by the MRT 7 Extension and Build Build Build Program that can ease the transportation of the people. Vista Pointe truly makes condo living in Katipunan a happy place where hardworking students and families can live, laugh, and dream. It is a perfect location where one can experience the right combination of comfort and convenience.

title: Preselling Megaworld Laurent Park in Cubao QC
description:
Laurent Park is a new, upscale residential condominium developed by Megaworld within the larger Manhattan Gardens complex in Araneta City, Cubao, Quezon City. 

 -Smart Home Living: All units will come with upgraded finishes, digital door locksets, and wireless smart home systems accessible via a dedicated phone app.

 - Strategic Location situated in Araneta City and seamless connections to various cities and provinces through major thoroughfares and transport terminals (MRT-3, LRT-2, P2P buses, e-shuttles). 

- A short distance from popular landmarks like Smart Araneta Coliseum, Farmers Market, New Frontier Theater, Gateway Mall, and Cubao Expo.

.- Laurent Park is a 39-story tower with an L-shaped structural design and nature-inspired hues. Units range from Studio to 2 Bedrooms, with 1BR & 3BR Lofted Units also available.

 - Turnover is expected by August 31, 2028, with a 6-month grace period.

description:
FOR SALE: Upgraded 3-Bedroom Condo at 53 Benitez by Rockwell | New Manila, Quezon City | With Balcony + Laundry Area | Php 16M | Clean Title
 

 Boasting a 95 sqm floor area, plus an additional 3 sqm private roof deck drying cage, this move-in-ready home is ideal for families or professionals looking for a serene yet central address. Located along P. Tuazon Avenue in Brgy. Horseshoe, 53 Benitez is known for its privacy, generous unit layouts, and premium build quality—hallmarks of Rockwell Primaries.
 

 This 3-bedroom condo for sale in New Manila features a well-thought-out layout that includes:
  3 Bedrooms (with large windows and lots of natural light)
  2 Full Bathrooms
  1 Secure Parking Slot
  Staff Room with its own Toilet & Bath—great for help or as a utility space
  Roofdeck drying cage—a practical bonus for laundry
  Balcony view facing a vacant lot—quiet and breezy
  Bedrooms facing P. Tuazon—providing open city views
  Upgraded —modernized cabinets enhanced function and comfort
  Clean Title ready for smooth transaction
  

 This unit is clean-titled, making it eligible for bank financing or cash purchase. 53 Benitez’s prime location in Quezon City near Greenhills, Ortigas, and New Manila provides accessibility to top schools like Xavier/ICA/LaSalle, shopping malls, hospitals, and business hubs.
 

 Live in the heart of New Manila in one of Quezon City's most exclusive low-density developments—53 Benitez by Rockwell. This upgraded 3-bedroom unit is a rare find, offering the comfort of a family home in a well-managed, secure, and peaceful mid-rise community.
 

 53 Benitez is a low-density residential development by Rockwell Primaries, known for its family-oriented environment, 24/7 security, attentive management, and generous common areas.
 

 Whether you’re a young family looking for a peaceful urban dwelling or an investor eyeing a reliable rental property in Quezon City, this unit offers excellent value, convenience, and peace of mind.

title: High Park Towers in Vertis North QC Elegant & Large Studio-type condo unit FOR SALE, Negotiable
description:
Tastefully furnished wood-themed large studio-type condo unit set in Ayala Premier’s serene & green mixed use township development:  Vertis North Estate.  3 major malls within walking distance:  Vertis Mall, Trinoma, & connected via covered walkway SM City North.  High Park residents can avail of shuttle bus services from the condo to & from Vertis Mall & Trinoma every 20-30 minutes daily from 6AM to 9PM.  Vertis is bounded by EDSA north bound lane, North Ave., Agham Road (now Sen. Miriam Defensor-Santiago  Ave., & Quezon Ave.

Fully furnished with select pieces & heavy-duty appliances, as follows:
- Stackable automatic LG ThinQ washing machine & dryer
- 55” Samsung Smart UHD TV
- Maximus 10-in-1 function oven 
- Beko ducted range hood
- Blakk induction cooker
- Ikea engineered wooden dining table for 4-6 pax
- Ikea dining chairs with seat pads
- Ikea pendant lamp over dining area 
- 2 Ikea linen-covered single beds made of solid wood plus 2 pieces 9”-deep springcoil mattresses 
- Roman shades
- Kolin 2HP Aircon
- Ikea Floor Lamp
- Square resin table top single-legged multi-purpose table
- Samsung 9cu.ft. refrigerator 
- Electric stand fan
- Ikea sliding door with passcode cabinet/mantel as TV stand
- hot & cold running water in the bathroom 
- nice built-in finishes like: 
~ engineered wooden flooring;
~ granite kitchen countertop;
~ ample built-in overhead & base kitchen cabinets;
~ built-in wardrobe;
~ shower glass enclosure;
~ spacious T&B toilet & bathroom;
~ granite countertopped lavatory with big mirror;
~ glossy tiles & exhaust fan in T&B
~ floor-to-ceiling windows

Both the interiors of this Condo Unit including the interior design of High Park Towers itself complement the exterior landscape of Vertis North neighbourhood, to include commercial and office areas, - it’s a total integration and immersion into a most preferred lifestyle.  Vertis North is touted to become the “Greenbelt of QC”.  Definitely a good investment in its early yet operational development stages.

Studio Unit Condominium For Sale at The Arton, Quezon City
description:
Step into modern city living with this cozy yet stylish 29 sqm studio unit, perfectly located on the 6th floor—offering just the right blend of comfort, convenience, and elevated views. Whether you're a young professional, a student, or an investor looking for a high-demand rental, this space offers everything you need in a smart, compact layout.




Every inch of this unit is thoughtfully designed. The open-plan layout creates a seamless flow from the living area to the kitchenette, maximizing the feeling of space while keeping everything within reach. The large window welcomes in abundant natural light, giving the unit a bright and airy vibe that feels larger than its size.




Located in a secure, well-maintained building with essential amenities and easy access to the city’s best hotspots, this studio offers the perfect launchpad for a dynamic lifestyle. Coffee shops, public transport, grocery stores, and entertainment hubs are just minutes away—making your daily routine easier and more enjoyable.




Ideal for minimalists, first-time homeowners, or as a turnkey rental property, this studio checks all the boxes. Move-in ready and fully functional, it’s the smart choice for anyone looking to make the most of city living without compromising style or comfort.

Own a prestigious 3-bedroom unit at Shang Summit, the newest and tallest luxury condo development in Quezon City by the renowned Shang Properties—a name trusted for high-end residential excellence across the country.

With units now pre-selling at exclusive launch rates, this is the best time to invest in a prime 3-bedroom home in a Quezon City landmark development. Whether for end-use, leasing, or long-term capital appreciation, this property is a golden opportunity.

This iconic twin-tower residential development rises over 260 meters, set to become the tallest residential building in the Philippines. Located in South Triangle, Shang Summit QC offers the rare combination of prestige, peace, and proximity.

title: Sentrove at Cloverleaf – Your Gateway to Elevated Quezon City Living
description:
Sentrove at Cloverleaf Balintawak
Introduction
Welcome to Sentrove, the prime residential development within the Cloverleaf Estate in Balintawak, a well-planned Ayala Land master community. Discover the perfect blend of urban convenience, accessibility, and modern living—ideal for both personal use and investment.

Description
Sentrove is a high-rise residential condominium offering thoughtfully designed units, smart living features, and lifestyle amenities. Positioned at the heart of Quezon City’s emerging Northern Gateway, this development offers the convenience of city life with the comfort of a secure and vibrant community.

Accessibility
Road Access
Strategically located right by EDSA Balintawak, Sentrove is seamlessly connected to major thoroughfares:


  EDSA

  North Luzon Expressway (NLEX)

  A. Bonifacio Avenue


Going North and South

  Northbound: Quick access to NLEX leading to Bulacan, Pampanga, and other Northern provinces.

  Southbound: Easy drive to central and southern Metro Manila through EDSA, C5, or Skyway.


10KM Radius
Within a 10-kilometer radius of Sentrove, you'll find essential lifestyle and institutional hubs:

Malls

  Ayala Malls Cloverleaf (within the estate)

  SM North EDSA

  Trinoma

  Landers Balintawak


Schools

  Ateneo de Manila University

  University of the Philippines Diliman

  Claret School of Quezon City

  St. Theresa’s College


Hospitals

  Capitol Medical Center

  Chinese General Hospital

  Philippine Heart Center

  Veterans Memorial Medical Center


Churches

  Sto. Niño de Congreso Parish

  San Lorenzo Ruiz Parish

  Sacred Heart Parish - Kamuning


Investment Starts at ₱50,000
Take advantage of an accessible entry point with initial investment starting at only ₱50,000. Whether you're a first-time homeowner or a seasoned investor, Sentrove offers excellent value and long-term growth potential.

Units to Offer

  Studio Unit

  1-Bedroom Unit

  2-Bedroom Unit

  3-Bedroom Unit


4 Key Factors of Smart Investing

  Prime Location: Strategically located in a growth corridor.

  Accessibility: Major roads and transit options within reach.

  Ayala Land Quality: Trusted developer with a solid track record.

  End-Use or Income Potential: Ideal for personal residence or rental income.

309 Katipunan | Condo Near Ateneo Nearby Establishments in 309 Katipunan Commercial Districts Schools and Universities Infrastructure Medical Institutions

One of Metro Manila's most extensive and populous cities in Quezon City. Being the most populous city in the nation, it boasts a very diverse cultural and ethnic background and a strong and thriving business district. It can be considered the hub of the Philippine entertainment industry as it is home to the two major broadcasting stations in the country, claiming the moniker Philippines' Hollywood. It is also near universities and academic institutions like Ateneo de Manila University, University of the Philippines-Diliman, and Miriam College. Vista 309 Katipunan by Vista Residences offers a distinctive urban lifestyle characterized by a youthful attitude, vibrancy, and comfort thanks to its contemporary design and sophisticated amenities. A fully urban student living experience is provided, which is only a short distance from institutions of higher learning. This residence ideally fits the always-on, convenience-driven lifestyle.




For those seeking residential homes in the metro area close to all accessible location points and local conveniences, this condo in Katipunan is furnished with first-rate amenities. With its prime location, you can also be confident that everything you require is close at hand.

title: Shang Summit 3 Bedroom unit with 2 parking for sale in Quezon City near Vertis North Solaire Trinoma ABS CBN GMA UST St Lukes UP Morato Scout Area
description:
𝐃𝐢𝐬𝐜𝐨𝐯𝐞𝐫 𝐒𝐡𝐚𝐧𝐠 𝐒𝐮𝐦𝐦𝐢𝐭: 𝐐𝐮𝐞𝐳𝐨𝐧 𝐂𝐢𝐭𝐲'𝐬 𝐍𝐞𝐰𝐞𝐬𝐭 𝐋𝐮𝐱𝐮𝐫𝐲 𝐋𝐚𝐧𝐝𝐦𝐚𝐫𝐤
Shang Properties proudly introduces its premier residential development in Quezon City: Shang Summit. This iconic luxury tower is set to redefine the Metro Manila skyline, offering an unparalleled living experience with its blend of sophistication, comfort, and prime location.


𝐋𝐨𝐜𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧: Strategically situated in Scout Borromeo, Scout Esguerra and Scout Bayoran Quezon City, providing excellent accessibility to major thoroughfares and key establishments.

100% Shangri-La Experience: Developed by Shang Properties, known for its commitment to luxury and exceptional service, ensuring world-class standards in every detail.

Low-Density Living: Enjoy exclusivity with only 16 units per floor, ensuring privacy and spaciousness.

Property Management: Professional property management by Shang Property Management for seamless and worry-free living.

Elevator Access: Equipped with 8 passenger lifts and 1 service lift for convenience.

Security & Concierge: Benefit from 24/7 security and concierge services for peace of mind.

World-Class Amenities: Indulge in an extensive array of amenities, including a Fully Equipped Fitness Gym, Cinema, Indoor & Outdoor Function Rooms, Indoor & Outdoor Children's Play Areas, Swimming Pools, Alfresco Lounges, and more.

𝐔𝐧𝐢𝐭 𝐓𝐲𝐩𝐞𝐬 & 𝐒𝐢𝐳𝐞𝐬:
Studio: 37-39 sqm

One Bedroom: 51-70 sqm

Two Bedroom: 88-125 sqm

Three Bedroom: 160.05 - 160.39 sqm

Penthouse Units: TBA

Note: Price is for unit only + VAT.


𝐀𝐜𝐜𝐞𝐬𝐬𝐢𝐛𝐢𝐥𝐢𝐭𝐲 & 𝐍𝐞𝐚𝐫𝐛𝐲 𝐄𝐬𝐭𝐚𝐛𝐥𝐢𝐬𝐡𝐦𝐞𝐧𝐭𝐬:
Experience ultimate convenience with close proximity to:

MRT Quezon Avenue: 3 minutes

Tomas Morato: 4 minutes

description: Following nature as a guide, The Residences at Commonwealth features a facade reflecting natural topographical lines and abundant, green areas designed to soothe the senses. The developer, Century Properties, deliberately aligned the eight residential buildings to the incline of the existing terrain. The towers provide energy efficiency for dwellers, as they’re designed to let the breeze of cool air and sunlight inside the units. Positioned in Batasan Hills, The Residences at Commonwealth in Quezon City makes everything accessible for its dwellers. When you settle in this neighborhood, you’ll be near shopping centers. Ever Commonwealth and Paragon Place Mall are within walking distance, so grocery shopping and leisure activities won’t be a hassle. If you need medical care, you’re half an hour away from the country’s top hospitals like Quezon City General Hospital, East Avenue Medical Center, and Capitol Medical Center.

title: 3 Beedroom With Balcony in Manhattan Cubao Move In 350k
description:
Promo Alert

Move In 350K / 6034 Dollars

25,000 m0nthly for 48 months 0% Interest

2 Beedroom with Balcony 68.20 SQM




WHY ARANETA CENTER

IT OFFERS A ONE-STOP

SHOPPING & DINING EXPERIENCE

Araneta Center is a dazzling mixed-use complex

strategically located in the heart of Quezon City

comprising 35 hectares of the finest shopping, dining

and entertainment in the metropolis. It has the

following famous shopping destinations in Quezon

City . . .




a) The Gateway Mall “Like no other

mall in the World”

The Gateway Mall has won the much coveted Merit Award in the 30th International Design & Development Awards Program of the International Council of Shopping Centers (ICSC) held in Phoenix, Arizona last November 30, 2006; It was voted as SHOPPING CENTER of THE YEAR by the PHILIPPINE RETAILERS ASSOCIATION.




The Gateway Mall

“Like no other mall in the

World”




a) CINEPLEX at The Gateway Mall

b) Ali Mall

The first fully enclosed shopping mall in the Philippines.

Named after famed boxing champion Muhammad Ali, it has a total area

of over 62,000 square meters and houses four levels of specialty

shops, entertainment outlets, designer boutiques, five cinemas,

parking, and a food gallery.

c) New Farmers Plaza

Farmers Plaza is Araneta Center’s gateway to EDSA. It

was renovated & expanded in 1999.

The 5-level complex is the first ever commercial

condominium in the Philippines. Farmers Plaza offers

60,400 square meters of prime retail space occupied

by value-for-money merchandise outlets.




STRATEGIC LOCATION

ARANETA FAMILY

The Araneta family is also well known to be "Asian royalty".

In 1952, J. Amado Araneta, a business tycoon, purchased a

35-hectare Cubao property that is now the Araneta Center from Radio Corporation of America (RCA). The Araneta Group is a progressive and diversified group of companies

anchored on food, leisure, and property development.

The Araneta Group is composed of four strategic business units.

• Araneta Center, Inc. (ACI)

• United Promotions, Inc. (Uniprom)

• Philippine Pizza, Inc. (PPI)

• Progressive Development Corporation (PDC)

The property is bounded by Epifanio Delos Santos Avenue, Aurora Blvd.,  P. Tuazon & 15th Ave. Araneta Center boasts of being the only mixed-use complex where the 2 major light rail transit systems intersect, Light Railway Transit Line 2 (from East to West) and Metro Rail Transit (from North to South). The two lines transport an average of 1.2 M passengers daily.

Araneta Center to Airport 15 km

Araneta Center to Makati CBD 10.4 km

IT HAS THE FAMOUS ARANETA COLISEUM

The Coliseum was started in 1957 & finished in late 1959.

In 1960 to 1963, the Coliseum received international recognition as the "Biggest covered coliseum in the world". Even today, it still remains as one of the largest clear span dome in the world

and the largest indoor facility in Southeast Asia with a dome diameter of 108 meters. It occupies a total land area of almost 40,000 square metres and has a floor area of 2,300 square metres.




NOTABLE EVENTS in ARANETA COLISEUM

SPORTS:

• Philippine Basketball Association

• University Athletic Association of the Philippines (UAAP)

• Thrilla in Manila

• Harlem Globetrotters

• 2006 WWE RAW Superstars

ENTERTAINMENT:

• Andrea Bocelli

• The Corrs

• Paul Anka

title: 2 Bedroom with Balcony in Manhattan Heights Cubao QC Move In 350K
description:
Promo Alert

Move In 350K / 6034 Dollars

25,000 m0nthly for 48 months 0% Interest

2 Beedroom with Balcony 68SQM




WHY ARANETA CENTER




IT OFFERS A ONE-STOP

SHOPPING & DINING EXPERIENCE

Araneta Center is a dazzling mixed-use complex

strategically located in the heart of Quezon City

comprising 35 hectares of the finest shopping, dining

and entertainment in the metropolis. It has the

following famous shopping destinations in Quezon

City . . .

a) The Gateway Mall “Like no other

mall in the World”

The Gateway Mall has won the much coveted Merit Award in the 30th International Design & Development Awards Program of the International Council of Shopping Centers (ICSC) held in Phoenix, Arizona last November 30, 2006; It was voted as SHOPPING CENTER of THE YEAR by the PHILIPPINE RETAILERS ASSOCIATION.

The Gateway Mall

“Like no other mall in the

World”

a) CINEPLEX at The Gateway Mall

b) Ali Mall

The first fully enclosed shopping mall in the Philippines.

Named after famed boxing champion Muhammad Ali, it has a total area

of over 62,000 square meters and houses four levels of specialty

shops, entertainment outlets, designer boutiques, five cinemas,

parking, and a food gallery.

c) New Farmers Plaza

Farmers Plaza is Araneta Center’s gateway to EDSA. It

was renovated & expanded in 1999.

The 5-level complex is the first ever commercial

condominium in the Philippines. Farmers Plaza offers

60,400 square meters of prime retail space occupied

by value-for-money merchandise outlets.




STRATEGIC LOCATION

ARANETA FAMILY

The Araneta family is also well known to be "Asian royalty".

In 1952, J. Amado Araneta, a business tycoon, purchased a

35-hectare Cubao property that is now the Araneta Center from Radio Corporation of America (RCA). The Araneta Group is a progressive and diversified group of companies

anchored on food, leisure, and property development.

The Araneta Group is composed of four strategic business units.

• Araneta Center, Inc. (ACI)

• United Promotions, Inc. (Uniprom)

• Philippine Pizza, Inc. (PPI)

• Progressive Development Corporation (PDC)

The property is bounded by Epifanio Delos Santos Avenue, Aurora Blvd.,  P. Tuazon & 15th Ave. Araneta Center boasts of being the only mixed-use complex where the 2 major light rail transit systems intersect, Light Railway Transit Line 2 (from East to West) and Metro Rail Transit (from North to South). The two lines transport an average of 1.2 M passengers daily.

Araneta Center to Airport 15 km

Araneta Center to Makati CBD 10.4 km

IT HAS THE FAMOUS ARANETA COLISEUM

The Coliseum was started in 1957 & finished in late 1959.

In 1960 to 1963, the Coliseum received international recognition as the "Biggest covered coliseum in the world". Even today, it still remains as one of the largest clear span dome in the world

and the largest indoor facility in Southeast Asia with a dome diameter of 108 meters. It occupies a total land area of almost 40,000 square metres and has a floor area of 2,300 square metres.




NOTABLE EVENTS in ARANETA COLISEUM

SPORTS:

• Philippine Basketball Association

• University Athletic Association of the Philippines (UAAP)

• Thrilla in Manila

• Harlem Globetrotters

• 2006 WWE RAW Superstars

ENTERTAINMENT:

• Andrea Bocelli

• The Corrs

• Paul Anka

• Miss Philippines

• Beach Boys

• Michael Buble

• Disney on Ice




IT HAS THE FAMOUS

ARANETA COLISEUM




LIVE-WORK-PLAY-MOVE CONCEPT




Project : Manhattan Heights

Recreational Amenities / Facilities

• Hong Kong-Singaporean inspired and the 1st ever transit-oriented

residential condominium at the HEART of Metropolis
